fork_status_and_schedule.highlight: Hegotá headliner proposal window closed; decision expected in 2 weeks
ETH/70 and ETH/71 added to Glamsterdam CFI scope

devnet_updates.highlight: bal-devnet-2 live; most consensus issues resolved, Hive tests pending
BAL optimization flags ready: prefetch and parallel execution toggles
Aragon delayed ~1 week; parallelized EVM work needs completion
BAL JSON-RPC changes and max item limit DOS protection added
nft-devnet-10 (ETH/70) available for testing with Geth/Nethermind/Besu/Reth

eip_changes.highlight: EIP-8024: Rejected push-postfix encoding; branchless normalization under review
DevNet-3 scope: EIP-8037 (state creation cost) + EIP-7954 (contract size)
BAL optimizations top priority; data repricing deferred to DevNet-4+

headliner_proposals.highlight: 4 EL headliner candidates: frame txs, SSE blocks, 2 encrypted mempools
Lucid encrypted mempool: leverages ePBS+FOCIL, symmetric key release off-protocol
Frame transactions: Approve propagation redesigned for proxy compatibility

testing_progress.highlight: Gas repricing testing framework refactored for flexible iteration

organizational.highlight: eth_simulateV1 RPC compatibility requested for DevNet-3

action_items.action: Client teams: Publish ordered headliner preferences (including no-headliner option)

decisions.decision: ETH/70 and ETH/71 CFI'd for Glamsterdam
ETH/70 part of DevNet-3 spec; clients without support can still participate

targets.target: February 19th - ACDC call for FOCIL headliner decision
